sentences.sentence: The value of India and Britain increase with steady steps between 2010 and 2013; while Dutch decrease with steady steps between 2010 and 2013.
The value of India and Dutch is greatly lower than Britain in 2010, 2011, 2012 and 2013.

sentences.sentence: The value of India and Britain increase with steady steps between 2010 and 2013; while Dutch decrease with steady steps between 2010 and 2013.
The value of India and Dutch is greatly lower than Britain in 2010, 2011, 2012 and 2013.
